articles.title: Founding Anniversary of Peasants' Union Marked
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of Peasants' Union Marked
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK celebrated the 90th anniversary of the Peasants' Union formed by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Il Sung regarded the peasant issue as an important one deciding the victory of the revolution after he embarked on the road of the revolution and had wisely led the work for awakening and organizing the broad masses of peasants to inspire them to the revolutionary struggle.
					
					 He personally went to vast rural areas including Kalun and Wujiazi to bring up hard cores there and founded the Peasants' Union, the first revolutionary organization of peasants in Korea, on March 10, Juche 17 (1928) on the basis of full preparations.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il steadily developed the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea so that it could fully discharge its historic mission as the Party’s reliable transmission belt and peripheral organization.
					
					 The idea of building the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are being successfully carried forward by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A meeting was held at the Central Hall of Workers on Friday to mark the anniversary.
					
					 Present there were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Korea, Ko In Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Agriculture, officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and agricultural workers.

articles.title: Establishing Juche-based Ferroalloy Process Underway
articles.content:
Establishing Juche-based Ferroalloy Process Underway
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Puryong Ferroalloy Factory in the DPRK is well known over the country as the one making big contribution to the development of metallurgical industry.
					 Recently, the factory succeeded in developing a new ferroalloy with locally available raw materials and is putting spurs to establishing the Juche-oriented ferroalloy process.
					
					 At the same time, it is building the processes for producing ferromanganese and ferrosilicon which will take a big share in increasing ferroalloy production by three times. To this end, the factory finished the laying of fire-bricks inside furnace in a shortest span of time and pushes forward other projects like power supply system.
					
					 Meanwhile, it is pushing ahead with such projects for technical innovations as setting up processes of producing multi-component ferroalloy with various alloy elements and modifiers and concentrating high-grade alloy elements.

articles.title: Ri Sung Gi, Inventor of Vinalon
articles.content:
Ri Sung Gi, Inventor of Vinalon
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Academician, Prof. and Dr. Ri Sung Gi is well known over the world as the inventor of vinalon.
					 He was awarded Kim Il Sung Prize, People's Prize and the titles of DPRK Labor Hero and People's Scientist for his distinguished feats performed in developing science and technology and chemical industry of the DPRK.
					
					 Ri was born in the closing years of Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910), but had to suffer racial discrimination and contempt under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea. Being brought up in a nationalist family, he cherished a desire to study on behalf of the Korean nation.
					
					 He was recognized as a brain, while studying abroad under adversity.
					
					 He devoted himself to his research project with national dignity and scientific ambition and thus invented vinalon, polyvinyl alcohol synthetic fiber, for the first time in the world at his thirties.
					
					 His desire to do scientific research for the Korean nation would be materialized by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), Ri was embraced in the bosom of the DPRK and could continue his research into vinalon with the special confidence of the President.
					
					 After the war, the then February 8 Vinalon Factory was built to produce vinalon with limestone and anthracite inexhaustible as raw materials on the basis of his research and the vinalon industry was created in the DPRK.
					
					 He had made a number of scientific achievements, while continuing his research into improving the quality of vinalon.
					
					 He worked as the director of the Hamhung Branch under the State Academy of Sciences from February Juche 50 (1961) till February Juche 85 (1996), being elected to the Supreme People's Assembly several times.
					
					 His typical work "Vinalon" (booklet) has been translated and published in other countries.
					
					 In his lifetime, Ri used to say as follows:
					
					 "If the coming generations ask about the history of vinalon, please tell them about the history of the Workers' Party of Korea founded and led by great leader Kim Il Sung, not about the name of a scientist or a technician.
					
					 Then they will come to know how vinalon could be born in this era."

articles.title: Memorial Service for Koreans Killed during Horrible Air Raid on Tokyo Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Koreans Killed during Horrible Air Raid on Tokyo Held
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for the Korean victims was held at the Tokyo metropolitan memorial hall on March 4 on the lapse of 73 years since the U.S. forces made an air raid on Tokyo.
					 Present there were Jin Kil Sang, director of the Rights and Welfare Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, Koreans in Japan, Kiyoshi Nishizawa, representative of the Tokyo fact-finding group for the probe into the truth about the forcible drafting of Koreans, and Japanese figures.
					
					 The participant paid silent tribute to the victims.
					
					 Read out there was a memorial address from the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims.
					
					 The memorial address said that Japan disguised itself as a victim to distort the truth.
					
					 It urged the Japanese authorities to apologize to drafting victims, pay reparations to them and take immediate practical measures to find remains to bury according to the wishes of bereaved families.
					
					 The representative of the Tokyo fact-finding group said that he would share pain with victims of the air raid and continue to make efforts to prevent the recurrence of such a disaster.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in DR Congo
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on February 27 posted on its website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Women Are a Dynamic Force Pushing Ahead with the Revolution and Construction".
					The work, published on March 8, Juche 84 (1995), says the Korean women have intense loyalty to the Party and play an important role in the revolution and construction and that the Korean women's movement has followed the proud road of victory under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Syrian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Syrian Media
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Syrian media made special write-ups interwoven with articles from February 14 to 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Syria TV Channel said, accompanied with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photos, that he firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country despite all sorts of sanctions by the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It showed the successes achieved by the Korean army and people in building a powerful socialist country under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The SANA reported with his photo:
					
					 The Korean people recollect with deep emotion the revolutionary career and exploits of the great man who devoted his all to the country and its people on the occasion of the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was a genuine people's leader who conducted all the work on the basis of the noble outlook on the people.
					
					 His life was recorded as a great epic of loving the people.
					
					 The Syrian Radio Broadcasting Service introduced the life of Kim Jong Il who made a gigantic contribution to the country, the people, the era and the history.
					
					 The Syrian papers Al Thawrah, Tishrin Al Baath referred to his ideological and theoretical exploits and Songun leadership exploits. They noted that he was an outstanding thinker and theoretician and the greatest man and his exploits serve as precious heritage guaranteeing the victory for the cause of socialism in the DPRK and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Organization of DR Congo Introduces Korean Women
articles.content:
Organization of DR Congo Introduces Korean Women
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted an article titled "Society respecting the women" on its website on March 3.
					 The article said:
					
					 Acts of violating the dignity and right of women are now committed in different parts of our planet.
					
					 But in the DPRK, the socialist state centered on the popular masses, all the rights of women as social human beings are guaranteed comprehensively.
					
					 The Korean women take an active part in the socio-political life with equal rights with men as mistresses of the country.
					
					 They also receive special benefits from the state and society.
					
					 They live free from all sorts of worries about giving birth to babies and bringing up them, educating children and treating sick ones, etc.
					
					 The world-famous Pyongyang Maternity Hospital eloquently shows what special benefits they enjoy.
					
					 The article noted that the dignity and right of the women are guaranteed on the highest level in the DPRK, evidenced by the facts that grandiose state events have been held on the occasion of March 8 International Women's Day, an excellent hostel was built in a short span of time to provide ample convenience for women workers' everyday life, adding that the DPRK is the only and one country that the norm of international law on sex equality comes true and women are respected and prioritized.

articles.title: Cobraremos sin falta el precio de crimenes de Japon, reitera entidad coreana
articles.content:
Cobraremos sin falta el precio de crimenes de Japon, reitera entidad coreana
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que hace poco, se dio a la publicidad en el Sur de Corea nuevo video sobre el asesinato de las esclavas sexuales coreanas cometido por el imperialismo japones a finales de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por Medidas sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso hizo publica la vispera una declaracion que sigue:
					Esa cinta, que estaba conservada en el Archivo Nacional de EE.UU., recoge las escenas de un lugar de la provincia de Yunnan de China donde las tropas agresoras japonesas asesinaron cruelmente el 15 de septiembre de 1944 a las mujeres coreanas tras imponerles la vida de esclava sexual en los campos de guerra.
					
					Ademas del documental, se conocio tambien el diario operacional de las fuerzas aliadas, segun el cual el ejercito japones fusilo el 13 de septiembre del mismo ano a 30 esclavas sexuales coreanas.
					
					Los recien descubiertos datos visuales y graficos delatan a todo el mundo las barbaridades del imperialismo japones que no tienen precedentes en la historia de guerras de ningun otro pais del mundo.
					
					Asimismo, dejan conocer una vez mas que Japon es el enemigo jurado que cometio intolerables crimenes antieticos contra la nacion coreana.
					
					No habra nunca la prescripcion para el antietico crimen de esclavitud sexual. 
					
					  Llega al cielo el clamor de las mujeres coreanas quienes fueron enterradas en las tierras extranjeras al cabo de vivir como esclavas sexuales de las tropas japonesas que violaron flagrantemente la dignidad humana y la virginidad de ellas.
					
					  Sin embargo, los compinches de Abe insultaron a ellas chismeando que "no hay datos que prueban el reclutamiento forzado de las ex consoladoras sexuales para el ejercito japones" y "el servicio de ellas fue el voluntario para ganar el dinero". Ademas, describen descaradamente como "definitivo e irreversible" el "acuerdo" sobre ese tema que fabricaron con la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye entregandole sumas insignificantes del dinero.
					
					Cuestionan los informes de las organizaciones internacionales, que senalan el crimen asqueroso de Japon, y les imponen abiertamente enmendarlos.
					
					Por otra parte, obligan a otros paises a eliminar las estatuas de nina esclava sexual para el viejo ejercito japones y plantean obstinadamente el llamado "problema de secuestro". 
					
					En vez de arrepentirse de sus inauditos crimenes del pasado, exponen abiertamente la ambicion de reagredir a la Peninsula Coreana y al continente asiatico reclamando a toda voz el "Estado normal" capaz de hacer la guerra bajo el amparo de EE.UU. 
					
					  De veras, tal fechoria, que causa vehemente indignacion, constituye una burla e insulto intolerables a la nacion coreana.
					
					No perdonaremos jamas la esclavitud sexual y todos los demas crimenes de Japon contra nuestra nacion y le haremos pagarlos mil veces mas caro.

articles.title: Se conmemora en Corea el 90o aniversario de fundacion de la Union de Campesinos
articles.content:
Se conmemora en Corea el 90o aniversario de fundacion de la Union de Campesinos
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se acogio en Corea el 90o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union de Campesinos por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Desde el comienzo de sus actividades revolucionarias, el presento el problema del campesinado como asunto importante que decide la victoria o la derrota de la revolucion y dirigio sabiamente las labores para hacer conscientes y agrupar a amplias masas campesinas y movilizarlas a la lucha revolucionaria. 
					
					En Kalun, Wujiazi y otras zonas rurales formo a los campesinos medulares y completo los preparativos para fundar una nueva organizacion campesina. 
					
					A base de ello, constituyo el 10 de marzo del 17 (1928) de la Era Juche la Union de Campesinos, primera organizacion revolucionaria del campesinado en Corea. 
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il desarrollo constantemente la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas para que ella cumpliera con su mision historica como fidedigna correa de transmision y entidad auxiliar del Partido.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un da firme continuidad a la idea y las hazanas de direccion de los lideres antecesores sobre la construccion de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea. 
					
					El acto central por la efemeride tuvo lugar hoy en la Casa Central de Obreros con la participacion del vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Hwi, el vicepremier y ministro de Agricultura, Ko In Ho, los funcionarios de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas y los agricultores.
